segments.text: This is ridiculous, look at that mess in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s just drying dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water’s gushing out of the sink everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor’s flooded, and her foot’s soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should turn off that faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are climbing on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s about to fall grabbing those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s dangerous, and she’s not even watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s encouraging him, reaching up too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined by the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious to all this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m fuming just seeing this carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
